channel.title: Add Objects
channel.description:
How would I come about adding an object (magic tree - 8404)
I used to know but I quit rsps and now im back but ive forgotten how to do it...
I would really appreciate help,
thanks,
- toonshorty

item.title: Add Objects
item.dc:creator: @I_pwnd_you_all I pwnd you all
item.description:
@I_pwnd_you_all wrote:

In CreateGlobalObject you would have something like
AddGlobalObject(Xcoord, Ycoord, ID, FACEdir, 10(0 for doors/walls));

Read full topic

item.description:
@toonshorty wrote:

No but theres an extra bit… and I cant remember…

anyone got a step by step tut?

Read full topic

item.title: Add Objects
item.dc:creator: @I_pwnd_you_all I pwnd you all
item.description:
@I_pwnd_you_all wrote:

[code]public void AddGlobalObject(int x, int y, int typeID, int orientation, int tileObjectType)
{
outStream.createFrame(85);
outStream.writeByteC(y - (mapRegionY * 8));
outStream.writeByteC(x - (mapRegionX * 8));

outStream.createFrame(151);
//outStream.writeByteA(((x&7) << 4) + (y&7));
outStream.writeByteA(0);
outStream.writeWordBigEndian(typeID);
outStream.writeByteS((tileObjectType<<2) +(orientation&3));
}

public void CreateGlobalObject(int objectX, int objectY, int typeID)
{
}[/code]
That’s some stuff I have…

Read full topic
